data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Růžička, Jan, Latella, Leonardo, Schawaller, Wolfgang (2015): New data on Apteroloma (Coleoptera: Agyrtidae) of central Asia and the Himalayas with a new synonymy. Zootaxa 3974 (1): 93-105, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3974.1.6
